key_points: Used to identify underlying relationships between variables
Each eigenvector has a corresponding eigenvalue
Eigenvectors are orthogonal if matrix is symmetric
Magnitude is not important, direction is
Used in PCA and other dimensionality reduction techniques
Clustering is the task of grouping data points
Goal is to maximize intra-cluster similarity
Used in customer segmentation, image recognition, etc.
Sparsity of data in high dimensions
Overfitting: model learns noise, poor generalization
Underfitting: model is too simple, high bias
